title: 86 Dimmer Switch 500W Gold Knob Adjusting The Brightness of Light for Living Room Dedicated Dimmer(One Size)

product_information.Best Sellers Rank: #650,227 in Tools & Home Improvement (See Top 100 in Tools & Home Improvement)   #1,081 in Dimmer Switches

description: 86 Dimmer Switch 500W Gold Knob Adjusting the Brightness of Light For Living Room Dedicated Dimmer
product_category: Tools & Home Improvement›Electrical›Switches & Dimmers›Wall Switches›Dimmer Switches
feature_bullets: Smooth Brightness Control: Effortlessly adjust light intensity with our 86-position rotary dimmer switch, perfect for creating the ideal ambiance in your living room
Gold Finish: Experience a touch of elegance with our gold knob and contact material, seamlessly blending with your home decor
Easy Installation: Enjoy quick and simple wall mounting with our quick connect terminals and RCA connector, compatible with 1-way circuits
Durable Construction: Built to last with a gold material that ensures reliable, long-lasting performance
Manual Operation: Enjoy hassle-free control with our manual operation mode, offering convenient touch control for your lighting needs
